title: Man fatally shot on Cleveland's West Side
content:
(cleveland.com file photo)
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- A man was fatally shot Thursday night in Cleveland's Cudell neighborhood, according to police.
The incident happened about about 10 p.m. at the site of the former West Tech High in the 2200 block of West 93rd Street, police said. The building is now home to an apartment complex.
A 29-year-old man was shot in the leg. He was taken to MetroHealth, where he later died, police said.
No charges have been filed and police did not identify any suspects.
Homicide detectives are still investigating the case, police said.
To comment on this story, please visit cleveland.com's crime and courts comments section.
